questions.question_text: An information security manager finds that a soon-to-be deployed online application will increase risk beyond acceptable levels, and necessary controls have not been included. Which of the following is the BEST course of action for the information security manager?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Present a business case for additional controls to senior management.

Selected Answer: D
D. The results of a risk assessment

When developing a business case to justify an information security investment, the most critical factor that enables an informed decision by senior management is the results of a risk assessment. A risk assessment provides a quantitative and qualitative analysis of the potential risks and threats to an organization's information security. It helps senior management understand the specific vulnerabilities and potential impacts that the organization faces.
